ygData.subject: robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Forgive me if I get the class wrong..but I believe the Enchanter class (?) can make themselves or anybody else appear to be another race.  I ve seen my
ygData.messageBody:
Forgive me if I get the class wrong..but I believe the Enchanter class (?)
can make themselves or anybody else appear to be another race. I've seen my
enchanter friends appear to be anything from Erudites, Trolls, Dwarves, and
even a tree! :) Nothing funnier than following a tree around on a
cross-country run.

So...back to the original thread... The Erudite merchants will only sell the
yellow robes (I even saw 2 other Erudites last night with yellow) to other
Erudites.

-- Lim'Dul.

>Message: 9
Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 13:40:13 -0700 (PDT)
From: Rich Mulawa <richard.mulawa@...>
>Subject: Re: banana robes

>And just how does one "DISGUISE" themselfs to look like anything but
what they are in this game?

>Geesh!
